name: 賴冠廷
objective:
The goal of this course is to introduce latest deep learning research and teach students how to develop deep learning applications using Python library (TensorFlow & Keras). Additionally, we cooperate with Qualcomm, which will send engineers to demonstrate using their Neural Processing SDK. The content includes:
•	Number recognition of License plate and Doorplate
•	Image Classification for 1000 categories
•	Object Detection for 9000 objects
•	Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN)
•	Recurrent Neural Networks (RNN)
•	Long-Short Term Memory (LSTM)
•	Generative Adversarial Networks (GAN)
•	Embedded Deep Learning Algorithms
•	Deep Reinforcement Learning
•	Qualcomm Embedded AI SDK

課程主要為介紹學術界最新的深度學習研究成果，教導學員使用Python深度學習套件，讓學員能將深度學習技術應用於各個不同的領域。另外本課程與Qualcomm台灣高通合作, 高通將來介紹如何使用Snap Dragon平台上的嵌入式AI SDK. 課程內容包括：
1. 車牌與門牌數字辨識
2. 人臉辨識
3. 1000種影像分類
4. 辨識9000種物件  
5. 自動駕駛模擬
6. 嵌入式深度學習演算法
空虛, 寂寞, 覺得冷? 讓深度學習來幫助你:
7. 遞迴式神經網路(RNN)：找不到人聊天？訓練自己的聊天機器人
8. 對抗生成網路(GAN)：用GAN產生自己的夢中情人
9. 深度強化學習(DRL)：訓練AI跟你一起玩遊戲
schedule:
1.  Introduction to Deep Learning
2.  Applied Math for Machine Learning
3.  Fundamentals of Machine Learning
4.  TensorFlow & Keras + Word Embedding
5.  Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) and Image Classification
6.  Recurrent Neural Network (RNN) and Long Short-term Memory (LSTM)
7.  Qualcomm SDK Training (1)
8.  Training your own ChatBot
9.  Object Detection
      a. YOLO 9000 – You Only Look Once
      b. Single-shot Multi-Box Detection
10. Deep Reinforcement Learning
      a. OpenAI GYM
      b. Playing Atari Games, Doom and Minecraft
11. Qualcomm SDK Training (2)
12. Generative Adversarial Networks
      a. Adversarial Attack for CNN
13. Qualcomm SDK Training (3)
14. Qualcomm SDK Training (4)
15. Virtual Environment for Visual Deep Learning
16. Student Project Demos
17. Visit to Qualcomm Taiwan’s Headquarters
materials:
Francois Chollet, “Deep Learning with Python, ” Manning, 2017
Ian Goodfellow, Yoshua Bengio, and Aaron Courville, “Deep Learning,” MIT Press, 2017
Latest publications on CVPR, NIPS, ICML, AAAI, ICLR
